verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> They that trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be as mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which cannot <S%H3808><s%> be removed, <S%H4131><s%> but abideth <S%H3427><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

As the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is round about <S%H5439><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> from henceforth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6258><s%> even forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> of the wicked <S%H7562><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> lest <S%H4616><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> unto iniquity. <S%H5766><s%>
Do good, <S%H3190><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> unto those that be good, <S%H2896><s%> and to them that are upright <S%H3477><s%> in their hearts. <S%H3826><s%>

As for such as turn aside <S%H5186><s%> unto their crooked ways, <S%H6128><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead them forth <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity: <S%H205><s%> but peace <S%H7965><s%> shall be upon <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
